Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at South Pacific Plaza, you'll be centrally located in Broadbeach, steps from Broadbeach Mall and Kurrawa Beach. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Oasis Shopping Centre and Pratten Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 84 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and DVD players are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and microwaves, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and an outdoor tennis court. This apartment also features tour/ticket assistance and barbecue grills.

Business, Other Amenities
The front desk is staffed during limited hours. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
